creator: novikov.i.m@gmail.com
text:
Broken condition in ./webapps/examples/WEB-INF/classes/examples/ShowSource.java:

 30         if(jspFile.indexOf("..") >= 0 || jspFile.toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH).indexOf("/WEB-INF/") != 0 || jspFile.toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH).indexOf("/META-INF/") != 0)
 31             throw new JspTagException((new StringBuilder()).append("Invalid JSP file ").append(jspFile).toString());

No ways to make all conditions 
   jspFile.toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH).indexOf("/WEB-INF/") != 0
and
   jspFile.toUpperCase(Locale.ENGLISH).indexOf("/META-INF/") != 0)
true both

creator: chuck.caldarale@unisys.com
text: Since the conditions are being or'd together, only one has to be true to generate the invalid file exception.  There's no expectation that multiple conditions must be true concurrently.
